name: 賴冠廷
objective:
本課程將介紹衛星通訊原理、無人機系統架構，與如何整合衛星和無人機來開發新的應用。課程內容包括衛星通訊、無人機原理與基本操作、開源機載控制軟體 (ArduPilot)、通訊協定 (MAVLink)、地面控制站 (Mission Planner)、飛行模擬與影像傳輸等。基礎之外將介紹進階應用，例如結合 4G/5G 網路遠端控制多台無人機、嵌入式 AI 影像辨識等。
This course will introduce satellite communication, Unmanned Aircraft Systems, and how to integrate satellites and drones to create new applications. Students will learn satellite communication theory, UAV basic operations, open-source embedded control software (ArduPilot), communication protocol (MAVLink), ground control station (Mission Planner), VR simulation and video transmission, etc. Additionally, we will introduce advanced topics and new applications, such as combining 4G/5G networks to control multiple drones, embedded AI models for drone image recognition, etc.
